import React from 'react' import Bredcrumb from 'src/components/core/Bredcrumb' import { useFormik } from 'formik'; import ReactQuill from 'react-quill'; import * as yup from 'yup'; import './styles.scss' let schema = yup.object().shape({ title: yup.string().required("Title is Required"), description: yup.string().required("Description is Required"), price: yup.number().required("Price is Required"), brand: yup.string().required("Brand is Required"), category: yup.string().required("Category is Required"), tags: yup.string().required("Tag is Required"), color: yup .array() .min(1, "Pick at least one color") .required("Color is Required"), quantity: yup.number().required("Quantity is Required"), }); const AddProduct = () => { const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { title: "", description: "", price: "", brand: "", category: "", tags: "", color: "", quantity: "", images: "", }, validationSchema: schema, onSubmit: (values) => { // dispatch(createProducts(values)); // formik.resetForm(); // setColor(null); // setTimeout(() => { // dispatch(resetState()); // }, 3000); }, }); return (

{formik.touched.title && formik.errors.title ? (

) : null}
